section: Exercise 3.17.2: Interpreting a recursive definition of a set of strings.
question:
(a)

The recursive definition given below defines a set S of strings over the alphabet {a, b}:

  • Base case: λ ∈ S and a ∈ S
  • Recursive rule: if x ∈ S then,

    • xb ∈ S
    • xba ∈ S

List all the strings of length at most 3 in S.
answer: We will refer to the first recursive rule as Rule 1 and the second recursive rule as Rule 2.
